title: international committee
extract: International Committee of the Red Cross [ICRC] Law and Legal Definition. The International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) is an impartial, neutral and independent organization created to protect the lives and dignity of victims of armed conflict and other situations of violence and to provide them with assistance.
extract_html: International Committee of the Red Cross [ICRC] Law and Legal Definition. The International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC) is an impartial, neutral and independent organization created to protect the lives and dignity of victims of armed conflict and other situations of violence and to provide them with assistance.
